V社出品必属精品（刀牌出来挨...
体验老游戏嘛，的确好玩，赞
got all the achievements in 7 hours in 1 day very fun game

Лучшая игра с головоломками и хорошей графикой (в своё время)
Очень любил играть в неё с друзьями 
Каждый день собирались и играли по очереди 
Лучшая игра. До слёз!!!
Хорошая игра с интересным геймплеем, советую для покупки прохождения 10 тупых машин из 10
感觉很像解密游戏的集合，同时真的十分烧脑，需要反复的尝试。

Infaltable juego para todo aquel que tenga Steam. Las conexiones con Half Life te dejan con ganas de más. El nivel de dificultad hace que quieras resolverlo a toda costa. Se convierte en algo personal, casi. Sube la vara de los puzzles en los videojuegos. Tiene una modalidad de juego cooperativo que te permite conocer mucho más de Aperture Science.
Good game, I had a lot of fun playing this. Got it because of the sale, can definitely recommend you to get this game, it's a fun experience!

I got this game for a dollar during the black friday deals along with portal 2 for the same price. I've played portal 2 with one of my friends on the xbox 360 before I decided to get this game, and first off, it clears up a lot of the storyin the 2nd one. It also has fun puzzles to try and solve and amazing final stages at the end of chamber 19. It always isn't too challenging and great for the casual gamer. I would definitely reccommend this product to anyone, especially when the black friday deals come aroound. Thanks for reading!
Sem palavras para essa obra de arte... Talvez seja um dos jogos que eu mais amei jogar, estou pela 6 vez zerando este jogo, e quero falar que é RECOMENDAÇO, ESTÁ 2 PILA PO, COMPRA, SÉRIO, COMPRA...
A creative idea realized with humor and sardonic wit, with a good balance of difficulty and playability.
So much fun, gets really challenging
Yep very fun, it could be a bit tough to figure out where to go in the end portion of the game. Overall HIGHLY recomend. Also, I think the cake is made out of dirt, but im not sure.
Good, even for a really old game.
this game is a timeless bit of fun and feels, yo! GlaDOS is a beautiful sweet robo yandere waifu, too! (I cringe at what I just wrote, but that doesn't make it any less true!)
You know why this game is good. Buy it now.
Muy trambólico el tema de los portales y es un juego que te lo puedes pasar en una tarde. Te hace pensar, muy divertido.
a neat puzzle game that needs to be experienced
Portal's story isn't as deep as the sequel, but it's just as fun. It doesn't have co-op, but you'll still find yourself challenged at times and having fun through every bit of it.
Сейчас играется так же интересно как и в 2007-ом!

Muy buen juego y te lo recomiendo cuando el Paquete de Portal 1 y 2 este de oferta
Muy buen juego de VALVE
Cool, original design and concept for a game. Interesting to play around with the mechanics and has a challenging puzzle aspect to it. Great game
По сравнению с Portal 2 - слишком легко и слишком мало, хотя доп. задания на шаги и время заставляют попотеть. Рекомендуется для ознакомления и к покупке в одном паке с Portal 2.
За 3,5 часа все мои нервы кончились. Я не рекомендую вам покупать эти овалы с пушкой, если хотите быть спокойным, сюжетности как таковой нет. Не знаю как это можно продавать за 259 без скидки.
Лучшая головаломка для любителей поразмышлять и неплохой сюжет, помню в детстве пиратку по раза 3-4 проходил. Однозначно рекомендую
4-5个小时就通关了，一代没玩，补票还是挺值的的哈
This game is funny and complex and I love it, play till the end and hear the song, IT WILL BE WORTH IT
Great game, a bit short, about 1 hour if your fast with puzzles, but overall very good game, as everyone knows.

gran bel gioco, facile da capire, bella trama e fatto veramente bene anche nei dettagli, può sembrare il solito rompicapo noioso ma non è così, anche se sono un giocatore di sparatutto e quindi non ho nulla a che vedere con questo gioco devo dire che me lo sono goduto veramente tanto sopratutto per la trama che all'inizio sembra non esserci ma poi che dire....vedrete voi!
The tragic story of a girl who shoots up a laboratory to get out of taking a test.
Excellent, histoire et concept original, l'histoire se finie un peu rapidement mais les défis ajoutent de la durée de vie !

- Bit short

+Everything else is great (music, graphics, story, gameplay)

Don't really know what else to say at this point in the 12 years this game has existed (seriously, 2007 is that long ago?!?! I feel old.....especially since I only started playing it circa 2016 or 2017 and just beat it now), but it's a fantastic puzzler that, even if it's relatively short, is very much worth a whole play at least once in your life.

This game has amazing mechanics with a nice little story. The achievements, advanced chambers, and challenges also add a lot of replayability. This game is absolutely legendary. I also recommend Portal 2 as well.

Wirklich eins der besten Spiele die ich habe. Es läuft einwandtfrei (ich habe keinen sonderlich guten Laptop), die Geschichte ist kurz und man versteht sie schnell. Vor allen Dingen sieht die Map fantastisch aus, dabei ist das Spiel schon etwas älter. Ich kann das Spiel an jeden weiter empfehlen, der science fiction, fortgeschrittene Technologie und böse KI mag.    10/10

Jogo curtinho mas muito bom. A história é muito boa, porém pra entender é preciso saber um pouco da história do Half-Life e prestar bastante atenção nos easter eggs e falas de uma das personagens. Ambientação muito massa e gameplay interessante. Não só ele como sua continuação valem muito a pena.
Vale muito a pena, mesmo sendo um jogo simples a trajetória de nível em nível te faz querer sempre jogar mais, recomendo muito
小学的时候同学通关了 很佩服他当时没有晕过去

This game is amazing!
It's not hard too much and it's one of the most fun things to finish a level that you had stuck on.
The story is good, the puzzles are great and you have to buy it.

조금 시대가 지난 게임이라는게 느껴지지 않을정도로 정말 재미있게 플레이했고
그래픽은 현실적이거나 화려하기보단 심플하고 깔끔한 느낌이였음.
그래도 개인적으로 정가주고샀으면 조금 아까울뻔했는데 이번 세일로 1, 2 합쳐서 1500원정도에 사서 아깝기는 커녕 정말 절을 올리고싶을정도로 혜자였음.. 뭐 언제 또 세일할지는 모르겠지만?

암튼! 짧은시간 플레이하면서 오랜만에 머리도 좀 굴려보고 하면서 재밌게 했음!
인제 2하러가야지ㅣㅎㅎㅎㅎㅎㅎ
Хорошая игра с годными головоломками и хорошим сюжет,советую поиграть...Stil alive :D

Like Portal 2, it's a fun game to exercise your brain (and also to question your intelligence through puzzle solving). However unlike Portal 2, it doesn't have the Workshop or mods (like Mel) to keep you playing afterwards. So if you buy a portal game, get the 2nd one.
Гейб как всегда, торт так и не дали

An amazing classic, nowadays only 1 buck at sales.

Definitivly a MUST-HAVE in collections.

At best only 5 hours of gameplay. (Story + Bonus + Challenges)

BUT there is only one big oopsie, the challenge *Less Steps* sucks, it's beyong unfair hard.
